show.subtitle: Specific information about using evidenced based natural health choices, with knowledgeable authors, guests and hosts.
show.title: The Natural Nurse

title: The Natural Nurse
content:
Dan Goldberg Dan was the former founder and owner of Optimal Wellness of Long Island. <!--more--> His holistic practice became one of the largest of its kind in the U.S, w/ a focus on cleansing and detoxification therapies.
  Dan is a Certified Nutritionist, Applied Kinesiologist, Colon Hydrotherapist, Energy Practitioner and Certified Tantra Educator, etc, amongst many other things.

Dan sold his practice almost 6 years ago and since then has become a leading advocate on Long Island for clean, safe water for everyone.
  He started his own water testing and water filtration company almost 2 years ago and has since merged his company with Long Island Clean Water…the largest water testing and filtration company of its kind on Long Island, with over 30 years of experience in understanding LI’s water issues and offering state of the art solutions that can meet the needs of safe, clean water for families, individuals and businesses throughout the tri-state area.

Dan is constantly on the lecture circuit, speaking and educating people about Long Island’s water issues w/ such groups as the Holistic Mom’s Association, The Metropolitan Home Inspectors Association, numerous local Rotary Groups, Doctors and Chiropractors offices and is a regular speaker at Whole Foods.
